Articles.Content:
If you were to accelerate towards the Mun, and at the half way point start decelerating, at 9.8m/s/s, this trip would take about three and a half hours...

Edited August 20, 2012 by SunJumper
This sounds more like a thread for the off-topic sub-forum, but I digress. That's awfully specific, by the way.
